note.p: Death: Ravenscroft Park, High Barnet, Hertfordshire (19 January 1897)
Education: University College, London. MB, MD

Career: Apprentice to a surgeon in Islington; practiced as a Physician; Medical Officer for Islington (for 16 years); Medical Inspector under the Privy Council (1871) and then under the Local Government Board; conducted enquiries into Public Health
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1897-1898 vol 62 pp iii-v signed by W H P
